subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Effective protection and management of Botswana's Environment and natural resources for sustainable, optimal and equitable benefits with minimum impacts. The programme will achieve this  by working towards three Objectives; (i) To support MEWT and other organizations so they are better able to satisfy their mandates for environmental protection and management; (ii) To strengthen the systems for conservation and sustainable use of natural resources; and (iii) To establish a national environmental information management system that can be applied to national development planning, environmental protection and management, research and other applications, within and outside Government.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: ENVIRONMENT SUPPORT PROGRAMME
